name: Escape Your Dreams
description:
In this game you play as a diamond character who is dreaming and tries to wake up by solving the riddles in its dreams. Find out more about its life and solve the riddles to help it escape its dreams!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls
- Movement: WASD/Arrow-Keys
- Interaction: Space
- Inventory: ESC
- Navigation inside inventory: Mouse/Left-click

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
